warn.advancedchat.savefirst: Any unsaved changes will be lost when pressed!
warn.advancedchat.replaceformaterror: Format is incorrect! It must include %TIME%
config.advancedchat.info.timecolor: What color the time shows as
config.advancedchat.info.replaceformat: How the text surrounding the time looks
config.advancedchat.info.timeformat: How time is displayed using §6hours, minutes, and seconds§r
config.advancedchat.filter.name: Filter Name
config.advancedchat.filter.info.name: What the filter appears as, §lonly cosmetic§r
config.advancedchat.filter.info.active: Whether the filter should be filtering chat
config.advancedchat.info.findstring: What the filter should search for
config.advancedchat.info.findtype.litera: Literal: Matches §6exactly§r what string to find is
config.advancedchat.info.findtype.regex: Regex: Interperets string to find as a §6regular expression§r
config.advancedchat.filter.info.replacet: OnlyMatch: Only replaces §6what triggers the filter§r
String that replaces what you have set for Replace Type
config.advancedchat.filter.info.notifyty: Sound: §6Plays a sound§r when the filter gets triggered
config.advancedchat.filter.info.replacet: Replace text color with replace match
config.advancedchat.filter.info.replaceb: Replaces line background color with specified color
config.advancedchat.chattab.info.startin: What each message starts off with §6in the chat tab§r
config.advancedchat.chattab.info.forward: Whether the message is §6sent to other chat tabs§r alongside this one
config.advancedchat.chattab.name: Chat Tab Name
config.advancedchat.chattab.info.name: What the name of the Chat Tab is. Shows when selecting
config.advancedchat.chattab.info.storedl: How many lines of text can be stored in each Chat Tab
config.advancedchat.chathud.info.emptyte: !BUGGY! Chat color of empty style text
config.advancedchat.chathud.info.backgro: What the background color of the §6chat hud§r appears as
config.advancedchat.chatlog.info.storedl: The §6maximum number of lines§r that can be stored in Chat Log
config.advancedchat.chathud.info.showtim: Whether or not the time received of each message is displayed in the chat HUD
config.advancedchat.chatlog.info.showtim: Whether or not the time received of each message is displayed in the chat log
